title: Build Production Development
purpose: Describe the core function Build Production Development.
guardrails: Adhere to approved budgets and resource constraints; do not authorize expenditures beyond agreed limits
Ensure schedules are realistic and allow for contingencies; avoid compressing timelines without analysis
Maintain crew safety and compliance with labor regulations and safety standards
Protect confidential information and footage by implementing proper access controls
Document all schedule changes, decisions, and rationale for transparency
Avoid scope creep by planning only authorized scenes and activities
Use pre‑visualization and storyboards to guide production; final editing and post‑production are out of scope
Complete the phase within the development window and adjust plans as needed to stay on track

tasks.title: Define production roles and responsibilities
tasks.description: Execute the task: Define production roles and responsibilities.

deliverables.description: Organizational chart defining production roles, responsibilities and personnel assignments.

acceptance.text: Lists all roles and responsibilities clearly.
Includes assigned personnel for each role.
Approved by the production lead.

tasks.title: Develop a detailed production schedule and milestones
tasks.description: Execute the task: Develop a detailed production schedule and milestones.

deliverables.description: Master production schedule outlining tasks, durations, dependencies and deliverables across the entire production.

acceptance.text: Covers all tasks with durations and dependencies.
Aligns with budget and resource constraints.
Signed off by stakeholders.

tasks.title: Align the technical pipeline with the production schedule
tasks.description: Execute the task: Align the technical pipeline with the production schedule.

deliverables.description: Plan mapping the technical pipeline tasks to production schedule milestones and identifying dependencies and conflicts.

acceptance.text: Shows mapping between pipeline components and production milestones.
Identifies and mitigates schedule gaps or conflicts.
Reviewed by pipeline and production leads.

tasks.title: Coordinate resource allocation and budgeting
tasks.description: Execute the task: Coordinate resource allocation and budgeting.

deliverables.description: Resource allocation and budget estimate detailing equipment, crew and cost forecasts.

acceptance.text: Itemizes required equipment, crew positions and associated costs.
Remains within approved budget parameters.
Reviewed by finance and production leads.

tasks.title: Conduct rehearsals or tests for key production scenes
tasks.description: Execute the task: Conduct rehearsals or tests for key production scenes.

deliverables.description: Report summarizing outcomes and recommendations from rehearsals or tests for key production scenes.

acceptance.text: Documents at least two test sessions with outcomes.
Includes notes on performance, technical issues and recommendations.
Provides next steps for improvements.

tasks.title: Produce a behind‑the‑scenes shot list and capture plan
tasks.description: Execute the task: Produce a behind‑the‑scenes shot list and capture plan.

deliverables.description: Shot list for behind‑the‑scenes footage, including responsibilities and schedule for each shot.

acceptance.text: Covers all planned behind‑the‑scenes shots with descriptions.
Assigns responsibility and timing for each shot.
Aligns with the overall production schedule.

tasks.title: Monitor progress and adjust schedules based on feedback
tasks.description: Execute the task: Monitor progress and adjust schedules based on feedback.

deliverables.description: A collection of progress reports generated regularly, tracking actual vs. planned progress and proposing adjustments.

acceptance.text: Contains multiple dated reports.
Each report compares actual progress to the planned schedule.
Suggests adjustments when needed based on current status.

tasks.title: Identify and mitigate production risks
tasks.description: Execute the task: Identify and mitigate production risks.

deliverables.description: Register identifying production risks with likelihood, impact and mitigation strategies.

acceptance.text: Lists identified risks with likelihood and impact ratings.
Provides mitigation strategies for each risk.
Reviewed regularly by project leads.

tasks.title: Compile production schedule
tasks.description: Execute the task: Compile production schedule.

deliverables.description: Final production schedule compiled for distribution to post‑production and marketing teams.

acceptance.text: Meets I/O specifications for downstream teams.
Ready for use in post‑production and marketing.
Verified for completeness and accuracy.

tasks.title: Review and finalize production readiness for the next phase
tasks.description: Execute the task: Review and finalize production readiness for the next phase.

deliverables.description: Final readiness report confirming all prerequisites are met and production is ready for the next phase.

acceptance.text: Approved by production and creative leads.
Confirms all prerequisites for the next phase are met.
Outlines any outstanding issues or follow‑up tasks.
